Articles.Content: Hi everyone. I just found a bug I think. My joystick just stops working at random times whenever I fly an unmanned vessel, it happens with every Remote Guidance Unit.

Moved to Support where we deal with these things.

@Flakorama, you may just be running out of electric charge, try watching the resource app on the upper right side of the screen.

If that is not the case please see here.
Thanks @sal_vager. I didn't know actually where to post it, this seems to be the right place. I'll go ahead and try to get some insight from Stock Support,
Just a thought, but the probes lose their axis controls when they lose commnet connection, so make sure you have a decent antenna, or you'll be limited to just SAS and throttle controls.

@sal_vager No cigar. I've tried with all kind of antennae and my control surfaces go all dead at 4 or 5 miles away from Launching Center. I'm full of power tho, not a single volt wasted, the power bar remains always full. I could send you a list of the mods I'm currently using if you want.

Edited October 21, 2016 by Flakorama

7 hours ago, Flakorama said:

@sal_vager No cigar. I've tried with all kind of antennae and my control surfaces go all dead at 4 or 5 miles away from Launching Center. I'm full of power tho, not a single volt wasted, the power bar remains always full. I could send you a list of the mods I'm currently using if you want.

Well, this section is for unmodded installs, so I'll move it to the modded support section as what you are describing just doesn't happen in a stock game.

Please post the mod list, the save and your logs to dropbox or similar, likely you are using something that has not yet been updated.
